{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RP-AC53.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = Wireless-AC750 Dual Band Repeater |caption2 = |pp = |sp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC53/HelpDesk/ |dl = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC53/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_RP-AC53 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = RP-AC53 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = A1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC750 |series = |type = repeater, range extender |sernum = 90IG03Y0-BO3410 |fcc_id = MSQ-RPAC53 |icid = 3568A-RPAC53 |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8881AN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX5281 |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = 3568A-RPAC53 |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 70:4D:7B, 88:D7:F6 |oui = 70:4D:7B, 88:D7:F6 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.1 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_RPAC53, ASUS_RPAC53_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2015 |estreldate = |reldate = |estprice = 45 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B01N0Y5SYJ |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192ER; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web GUI: http://repeater.asus.com *'''Boost Existing Wi-Fi''' - Extend 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi network :with speeds up to 733 Mbps (N300 + AC433). *'''Easy Setup''' - Find the best location with the smart LED signal :strength indicator, and set up with the WPS button. *'''ASUS Extender app''' - PC-free setup of network, anytime, anywhere. *'''Flexible Mode Options''' – Repeater, Access Point or Media Bridge. *'''AC Pass-Through''' - Keeps the power outlet free for use. ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.redeszone.net/asus/rp-ac53-ac750/ ''ASUS RP-AC53'' on '''RedesZone'''] (ES) *[https://techtest.org/wie-viel-repeater-braucht-man-wirklich-7x-wlan-repeater-im-vergleich/ ''ASUS RP-AC51/55'' on '''TechTest'''] (DE) *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/asus-rp-ac53-ac750-dual-band-wi-fi-repeater-3839 ''ASUS RP-AC53'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] ==Notes== ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> |
# Realtek SoC
#export RT-RTL8198C := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  #IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y LFP=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y USB="USB" BUILD_NAME="RT-RTL8198C" #DNSMQ=y MODEM=y 
  NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y DEBUGFS=y JFFS2LOG=y REPEATER=y DUALWAN=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y CFE_NVRAM_CHK=y #DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y JFFS2=y

export RP-AC68U := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y MEDIASRV=y
  SMARTSYNCBASE=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" APP="installed" BUILD_NAME="RP-AC68U" 
  RPAC68U=y NVRAM_64K=y TFAT=y NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" ODMPID=y YAFFS=y 
  PSISTLOG=y REPEATER=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y 
  CONCURRENTREPEATER=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y WEBDAV=y 
  REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC55 := REALTEK=y RTL8197F=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC55" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y WLCSCAN_RSSI=y BT_CONN=y MUMIMO_5G=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC53 := REALTEK=y RTL819X=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC53" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y
}} ==See also== *[[ASUS RP-AC87]] - ''Wireless-AC2600 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC87/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC68U]] - ''Wireless-AC1900 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC68U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC66]] - ''Wireless-AC1750 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC66 PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC56]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC56/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC55]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC55/ PPage] *ASUS RP-AC53 - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC53/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC52]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater/AP'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC51]] - ''AC750 Wall-Plug Wi-Fi Range Extender'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC51/ PPage] :''/Access Point/Media Bridge with Signal Indicator'' • [https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07577ZQTB B07577ZQTB] [[Category:English Documentation]]
